creator: ceki@apache.org
text:
From: "David Thielen" <dave@windward.net> 
To: <log4j-user@jakarta.apache.org> 
Subject: log4j version number 
Date: Wed, 23 Apr 2003 12:33:56 -0600 

Is there any log4j static method or field that will give the version number? I 
have users that are using older versions that is causing trouble so I want to 
print the version number so I know what is going on.

creator: mprice@atl.lmco.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 17862 ***
